targets.query: SELECT sum("confirmed")-sum(deaths)-sum(recovered) FROM "covid19" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(24h) fill(null)
SELECT 100*sum("deaths")/sum(confirmed) FROM "covid19" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(24h) fill(null)
SELECT 100*sum("recovered")/sum(confirmed) FROM "covid19" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(24h) fill(null)

SELECT sum("confirmed") AS "confirmed", sum("deaths") AS "deaths", sum("recovered") AS "recovered", 100*sum(deaths)/sum(confirmed) as "fatality_ratio", 100*sum(recovered)/sum(confirmed) as "recovery_ratio", sum("confirmed")-sum(deaths)-sum(recovered) as "remaining" FROM "covid19" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(24h) fill(previous)
SELECT sum("confirmed")-sum(deaths)-sum(recovered) FROM "covid19" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(24h), "country" fill(null)
